p: Overall, for this climate scenario, only one-half of the suitable areas seen in the present, around 275,000 km 2, were characterized as a potential habitat for the species, comprising the southern, western, and southwestern Caribbean, the southern Gulf of Mexico, and the Bahamian, Greater Antilles, and eastern Brazil regions .
